channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by 2x1 Komunikacije for CroElecto, 19 March 2018 – Seat Projections
item.description:
• Hrvatska demokratska zajednica (EPP): 4–5 seats
  • Socijaldemokratska partija Hrvatske (S&D): 3–4 seats
  • Most nezavisnih lista (*): 1 seats
  • Živi zid (*): 1–2 seats
  • Hrvatska narodna stranka–liberalni demokrati (ALDE): 0 seats
  • Bandić Milan 365–Stranka rada i solidarnosti (*): 0 seats
  • Istarski demokratski sabor (ALDE): 0 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by 2x1 Komunikacije for CroElecto, 19 March 2018 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by 2x1 Komunikacije for CroElecto, 19 March 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Hrvatska demokratska zajednica (EPP): 27.6–33.6%
  • Socijaldemokratska partija Hrvatske (S&D): 22.8–28.5%
  • Most nezavisnih lista (*): 7.4–11.2%
  • Živi zid (*): 10.8–15.2%
  • Hrvatska narodna stranka–liberalni demokrati (ALDE): 0.5–1.9%
  • Bandić Milan 365–Stranka rada i solidarnosti (*): 0.7–2.2%
  • Istarski demokratski sabor (ALDE): 1.1–2.9%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Promocija plus for HRT, 28 February–3 March 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Hrvatska demokratska zajednica (EPP): 31.1–36.7%
  • Socijaldemokratska partija Hrvatske (S&D): 21.9–27.0%
  • Most nezavisnih lista (*): 6.8–10.1%
  • Živi zid (*): 11.0–14.9%
  • Hrvatska narodna stranka–liberalni demokrati (ALDE): 1.6–3.4%
  • Hrvatska seljačka stranka (EPP): 2.0–4.1%
  • Bandić Milan 365–Stranka rada i solidarnosti (*): 1.8–3.7%
  • Istarski demokratski sabor (ALDE): 1.2–2.9%
  • Pametno (ALDE): 1.0–2.6%

item.title: Opinion Poll by IPSOS PULS for Nova TV, 1–20 February 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Hrvatska demokratska zajednica (EPP): 29.5–35.6%
  • Socijaldemokratska partija Hrvatske (S&D): 19.0–24.4%
  • Most nezavisnih lista (*): 5.7–9.1%
  • Živi zid (*): 11.3–15.8%
  • Hrvatska narodna stranka–liberalni demokrati (ALDE): 1.5–3.5%
  • Hrvatska seljačka stranka (EPP): 1.7–3.9%
  • Bandić Milan 365–Stranka rada i solidarnosti (*): 2.3–4.6%
  • Istarski demokratski sabor (ALDE): 1.9–4.1%
  • Pametno (ALDE): 2.6–5.0%
